A video game is a game played by electronically manipulating images produced by a computer program on a television screen or other display screen.

patterns: What is Zelda: Breath of the Wild
responses: Zelda: Breath of the Wild is a video game produced by Nintendo. It is one of the games in The Legend of Zelda video game series, it came out in 2017. It is an open world game where once again Link is tasked with saving the Kingdom of Hyrule from Ganon and saving Princess Zelda at the same time.

patterns: What is the purpose of the game?
responses: Breath of the Wild is set at the end of the series' timeline; the player controls Link, who awakens from a hundred-year slumber to defeat Calamity Ganon before it can destroy the kingdom of Hyrule and save Princess Zelda. Similarly, to the original Legend of Zelda (1986), players are given little instruction and can explore the open world freely. There are multiple side quests that the players can participate in as well as the main quest.

patterns: Who is Zelda in Zelda: Breath of the Wild?
responses: Princess Zelda is an ancestor of the Royal Family of Hyrule and is said to be the mortal incarnation of the Goddess Hylia. Zelda has spent 100 years inside Hyrule Castle, as she restrains Calamity Ganon from escaping and destroying Hyrule. During the game, Princess Zelda and Link work together to take on Calamity Ganon in a bid to restore Hyrule to its former glory.

patterns: What character do you play in BOTW?
responses: Link is the main character and is who you play as in the game. Link is a Knight of Hyrule and in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, he is tasked with defeating Calamity Ganon and saving Princess Zelda after awakening at the Shrine of Resurrection.

patterns: What is the Kingdom of Hyrule?
responses: Hyrule is the kingdom that serves as the iconic setting for a majority of the Zelda games. It was once ruled by the goddess Hylia and is now run by the Royal Family of Hyrule.

patterns: What is Impas role in BOTW?
responses: Impa presides as the elder of Kakariko Village in Breath of the Wild, awaiting the time for Link to awaken from his Slumber of Restoration. When Link arrives at her House, Impa remarks on how long it has been and asks if he remembers her. When Link does not remember her, she helps him find his memories and keeps him on track to save Zelda from Calamity Ganon.

Ganon is the final boss and the lead antagonist in the Zelda series. In BOTW, Ganon is reincarnated as Calamity Ganon who appeared ten thousand years ago to ravage the world of Hyrule and created the event known as the Great Calamity. With the help of the Sheikah, the divine beasts, Zelda was able to seal him away. Zelda seal begins to weaken, and she wakes Link up to end Calamity Ganon.

patterns: How many divine beasts are there?
What are the divine beasts purpose?
responses: There are four Divine Beasts that are mechanical animals built by the ancient Sheikah in order to aid the princess and the hero of legend to seal away Calamity Ganon ten thousand years ago. The four beasts are: the elephant, Ruta, the salamander, Rudania, the eagle, Medoh and the camel, Naboris. They each have a champion to control their powers. They are used to help stop Calamity Ganon when Link awakens.

patterns: what is the Hero of Legend?
Who is the hero of legend?
responses: The hero of legend is an expert swordsmand and royal knight. Link is the hero of legend. He is capable of weilding the Sheikah technology.

They are a race of humanoids in the Legend of Zelda series. They are a secretive trive who were chosen guardians of the Goddess Hylia to protect her rencarnation, Zelda. They are an advanced civilization whose power and wisdom had saved the land of Hyrule many times. In BOTW, there are only remnants of them and their technology after the Great Calamity happened. Link is able to use their technology to gain strength and wisdom to fight Calamity Ganon.

patterns: Who can use the master sword?
responses: This sword is bound to the hero of legend and was weilded by Link during the great calamity. Link is the only one who can weild it. Link has to gain great strength after his resurrection to be able to weild it again. The sword can be found in Korok Forest.

The Sheikah Slate is an object created by the Sheikah to control different parts of their technology. Zelda tells Link to use the Sheikah Slate at the shrine of resurection to aid him in his journey to stop Calamity Ganon. The slate functions as a map and has the ability to use runes which include Remote Bomb, Magnesis, Stasis, and Cryonis.

patterns: What is the purpose of Shrines?
responses: Shrines are found over all of Hyrule and were built by the Sheikah. The sheikah slate is required to gain access to the shrines. The shrines are puzzels that Link has to solve in order to collect items and spirit orbs.

patterns: Why do you need to go to Korok Forest?
What is the importance of Korok Forest?
responses: The Korok forest is a woodland region in the center of the Hyrule Forest. This forest is home to spirits, Koroks, and the master sword. Link has to go to the Korok Forest to get the master sword in order to defeat Calamity Ganon.

patterns: What is the Shrine of Resurrection?
Who is at the Shrine of Resurrection?
responses: The Shrine of Resurrection is where BOTW starts. Link awakens from his 100 year slumber here without his memories. Link was placed here to recover after the Great Calamity so that he might be able to fight Calamity Ganon another day.

patterns: What kind of items do you get in BOTW?
responses: Items can be almost anything that is collectable in BOTW. They can range from stones, weapons, powers, to ingredients for food.

patterns: Why do you need Spirit Orbs?
responses: Sprit orbs are items that are collected after completing a shrine. These orbs are a symbol of courage given by the Sheikah Monks. Once four orbs have been collected, they can be used to increase Links health or stamina.

patterns: What is the purpose of a korok seed?
responses: Korok seeds are seeds that are given by Koroks. Koroks are a woodland race who where leaf masks over their faces in the Legnend of Zelda series. By collecting Korok seeds, you are able to increase Link's weapon inventory. You need to find 441 seeds to max out the inventory.

patterns: What role does Urbosa play in BOTW?
responses: Urbosa is a champion who pilots Divine Beast Naboris. She is the queen of the Gerudo nation. She is also capable of manipulating lightning, which is called Urbosa's Fury. Urbosa helps Link by giving him her ability to manipulate lightning in order to help him defeat Calamity Ganon. She also weilds Naboris to help weaken Calmity Ganon.

patterns: What role does Mipha play in BOTW?
responses: Mipha is a champion who pilots Divine Beast Ruta. She is the princess of the Zora nation. She is also capable of healing, which is called Mipha's Grace. Mipha helps Link by giving him her ability to heal in order to help him defeat Calamity Ganon. She also weilds Ruta to help weaken Calmity Ganon.

patterns: What role does Revali play in BOTW?
responses: Revali is a champion who pilots Divine Beast Rito. He is a prominent figure in the Rito nation. He is also capable of manipulating wind, which is called Revalis Gale. Revali helps Link by giving him his ability to manipulate wind in order to help him defeat Calamity Ganon. He also weilds Medoh to help weaken Calmity Ganon.

patterns: What role does Daruk play in BOTW?
responses: Daruk is a champion who pilots Divine Beast Rudania. He is a prominent figure in the Goron nation. He is also capable of protecting himself, which is called Daruks Protection. Daruk helps Link by giving him his ability to protect himself in order to help him defeat Calamity Ganon. He also weilds Rudania to help weaken Calmity Ganon.

patterns: Are there monsters to fight in BOTW?
responses: There are a ton of monsters all over the BOTW map. They come in all shapes and strengths so be careful wandering around because you never know where they will show up and how easy they will be to beat!

Hearts represent how much health Link has at one time. Link can obtain up to 30 hearts. You can increase Links hearts by collecting spirit orbs from different shrines. Link will require more hearts as the game progresses in order to stay alive as monsters/quests become harder.

A champion is a chosen individual who joins a team that is meant to battle against Calamity Ganon. There are four champions and each champion is capable of contorling a divine beast. The four champions are Urbosa, Mipha, Revali, and Daruk.

patterns: Does not sound like a fun game
responses: I respect your opinion but BOTW is literally the best game ever so maybe you're just boring.
